src_original: yadi kevalayā tvacāvṛtā na bhavenmakṣikapatramātrayā // Saund_8.52 //  tvacaveṣṭitamasthipañjaraṃ yadi kāyaṃ samavaiṣi yoṣitām /  madanena ca kṛṣyase balādaghṛṇaḥ khalvadhṛtiśca manmathaḥ // Saund_8.53 //
tgt_original: yadi kevalayā tvacāvṛtā na bhavenmakṣikapatramātrayā ||52 ||  tvacaveṣṭitamasthipañjaraṃ yadi kāyaṃ samavaiṣi yoṣitām |  madanena ca kṛṣyase balādaghṛṇaḥ khalvadhṛtiśca manmathaḥ ||53 ||

src_original: śubhatāmaśubheṣu kalpayan nakhadantatvacakeśaromasu /
tgt_original: śubhatāmaśubheṣu kalpayan nakhadantatvacakeśaromasu |

src_original: avicakṣaṇa kiṃ na paśyasi prakṛtiṃ ca prabhavaṃ ca yoṣitām // Saund_8.54 //
tgt_original: avicakṣaṇa kiṃ na paśyasi prakṛtiṃ ca prabhavaṃ ca yoṣitām ||54 ||

src_original: tadavetya manaḥśarirayorvanitā doṣavatīrviśeṣataḥ /  capalaṃ bhavanotsukaṃ manaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabalena vāryatām // Saund_8.55 //
tgt_original: tadavetya manaḥśarirayorvanitā doṣavatīrviśeṣataḥ |  capalaṃ bhavanotsukaṃ manaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabalena vāryatām ||55 ||

src_original: śrutavān matimān kulodgataḥ paramasya praśamasya bhājanam /
tgt_original: śrutavān matimān kulodgataḥ paramasya praśamasya bhājanam |

src_original: upagamya yathā tathā punarna hi bhettuṃ niyamaṃ tvamarhasi // Saund_8.56 //
tgt_original: upagamya yathā tathā punarna hi bhettuṃ niyamaṃ tvamarhasi ||56 ||

src_original: abhijanamahato manasvinaḥ priyayaśaso bahumānamicchataḥ /
tgt_original: abhijanamahato manasvinaḥ priyayaśaso bahumānamicchataḥ |

src_original: nidhanamapi varaṃ sthirātmanaścyutavinayasya na caiva jīvitam // Saund_8.57 //
tgt_original: nidhanamapi varaṃ sthirātmanaścyutavinayasya na caiva jīvitam ||57 ||

src_original: baddhvā yathā hi kavacaṃ pragṛhītacāpo,
tgt_original: baddhvā yathā hi kavacaṃ pragṛhītacāpo,

src_original: nindyo bhavatyapasṛtaḥ samarād rathasthaḥ /
tgt_original: nindyo bhavatyapasṛtaḥ samarād rathasthaḥ |

src_original: bhaikṣākamabhyupagataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ,
tgt_original: bhaikṣākamabhyupagataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ,

src_original: nindyastathā bhavati kāmahṛtendriyāśvaḥ // Saund_8.58 //
tgt_original: nindyastathā bhavati kāmahṛtendriyāśvaḥ ||58 ||

src_original: hāsyo yathā ca paramābharaṇāmbarastrag bhaikṣaṃ caran dhṛtadhanuścalacitramauliḥ /  vairūpyamabhyupagataḥ parapiṇḍabhojī hāsyastathā gṛhasukhābhimukhaḥ satṛṣṇaḥ // Saund_8.59 //
tgt_original: hāsyo yathā ca paramābharaṇāmbarastrag bhaikṣaṃ caran dhṛtadhanuścalacitramauliḥ |  vairūpyamabhyupagataḥ parapiṇḍabhojī hāsyastathā gṛhasukhābhimukhaḥ satṛṣṇaḥ ||59 ||

src_original: yathā svannaṃ bhuktvā paramaśayanīye 'pi śayito  varāho nirmuktaḥ punaraśuci dhāvet paricitam /
tgt_original: yathā svannaṃ bhuktvā paramaśayanīye'pi śayito,  varāho nirmuktaḥ punaraśuci dhāvet paricitam |

src_original: tathā śreyaḥ śrṛṇvan praśamasukhamāsvādya guṇavad,
tgt_original: tathā śreyaḥ śrṛṇvan praśamasukhamāsvādya guṇavad,

src_original: vanaṃ śāntaṃ hitvā gṛhamabhilaṣet kāmatṛṣitaḥ // Saund_8.60 //
tgt_original: vanaṃ śāntaṃ hitvā gṛhamabhilaṣet kāmatṛṣitaḥ ||60 ||

src_original: yatholkā hastasthā dahati pavanapreritaśikhā  yathā pādākrānto daśati bhujagaḥ krodharabhasaḥ /
tgt_original: yatholkā hastasthā dahati pavanapreritaśikhā yathā pādākrānto daśati bhujagaḥ krodharabhasaḥ |

src_original: yathā hanti vyāghraḥ śiśurapi gṛhīto gṛhagataḥ  tathā strīsaṃsargo bahuvidhamanarthāya bhavati // Saund_8.61 //
tgt_original: yathā hanti vyāghraḥ śiśurapi gṛhīto gṛhagataḥ tathā strīsaṃsargo bahuvidhamanarthāya bhavati ||61 ||

tgt_original: tadvijñāya manaḥśarīraniyatānnārīṣu doṣānimān,

src_original: matvā kāmasukhaṃ nadījalacalaṃ kleśāya śokāya ca /
tgt_original: matvā kāmasukhaṃ nadījalacalaṃ kleśāya śokāya ca |

tgt_original: dṛṣṭvā durbalamāmapātrasadṛśaṃ mṛtyūpasṛṣṭaṃ jagan-
